alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued July 26 at 6:25AM AKDT until July 27 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY... The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a High Surf Advisory, which is in effect until 6 AM AKDT Wednesday. * LOCATION...The Bering Strait to Cape Rodney * TIMING...Through Noon Wednesday. The highest water levels are expected between 10 AM and 10 PM today. * IMPACTS...Objects left on the beach could be washed away. Minor beach erosion will occur. * WAVE AND SURF...Sea levels will rise 2 feet above the normal high tides. Waves will wash up to the top of the beach.
info.instruction: A High Surf Advisory means that localized beach erosion is expected. Precautions should be taken to protect property.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
